    • Method Detail

      • getNamedParameter

        public String getNamedParameter(NamedParameterNode<?> np)
        Description copied from interface: Configuration
        Return the value of the given named parameter as an unparsed string.

        If nothing was explicitly bound, this method returns null (it does not return default values).

        Specified by:
        getNamedParameter in interface Configuration
        Parameters:
        np - A NamedParameter object from this Configuration's class hierarchy.
        Returns:
        The validated string that this parameter is bound to, or null.
        See Also:
        Configuration.getClassHierarchy()

        Specified by:

        Returns:
        the external constructor that cn has been explicitly bound to, or null. Defaults are not returned.

      • getLegacyConstructor

        public <T> ConstructorDef<T> getLegacyConstructor(ClassNode<T> cn)
        Description copied from interface: Configuration
        Return the LegacyConstructor that has been bound to this Class. Such constructors are defined in the class, but missing their @Inject annotation.

        For now, only one legacy constructor can be bound per class.

        TODO: Should this return Set> instead?

        Specified by:
        getLegacyConstructor in interface Configuration

      • newBuilder

        public ConfigurationBuilder newBuilder()
        Description copied from interface: Configuration
        Create a new ConfigurationBuilder object based on the same classpath as this Configuration, and populate it with the configuration options of this object.

        This API is unstable and should be considered private. Use the methods in org.apache.reef.Tang instead.

        Specified by:
        newBuilder in interface Configuration

      • getClassHierarchy

        public ClassHierarchy getClassHierarchy()
        Description copied from interface: Configuration
        Configuration objects are associated with the ClassHierarchy objects that were used during validation.
        Specified by:
        getClassHierarchy in interface Configuration
        Returns:
        the ClassHierarchy that backs this Configuration.

      • getBoundSet

        public Set<Object> getBoundSet(NamedParameterNode<Set<?>> np)
        Description copied from interface: Configuration
        Obtain the set of class hierarchy nodes or strings that were bound to a given NamedParameterNode. If nothing was explicitly bound, the set will be empty (it will not reflect any default values).
        Specified by:
        getBoundSet in interface Configuration
        Parameters:
        np - A NamedParameterNode from this Configuration's class hierarchy.
        Returns:
        A set of ClassHierarchy Node objects or a set of strings, depending on whether the NamedParameterNode refers to an interface or configuration options, respectively.
        See Also:
        Configuration.getClassHierarchy()

      • getBoundList

        public List<Object> getBoundList(NamedParameterNode<List<?>> np)
        Description copied from interface: Configuration
        Get the list bound to a given NamedParameterNode. The list will be empty if nothing was bound.
        Specified by:
        getBoundList in interface Configuration
        Parameters:
        np - Target NamedParameter
        Returns:
        A list bound to np

      • getBoundSets

        public Iterable<Map.Entry<NamedParameterNode<Set<?>>,Object>> getBoundSets()
        Description copied from interface: Configuration
        Get the set bindings from set-valued NamedParameters to the values they were bound to.

        TODO: This API seems wonky. Why not return a Set>> instead, and let the caller invoke getBoundSet() above?

        Specified by:
        getBoundSets in interface Configuration
        Returns:
        a flattened set with one entry for each binding (the same NamedParameterNode may be a key for multiple bindings.
